channel.title: Python on Varun_Dev
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Varun_Dev

item.title: Movie Plix
item.description: Project 2: Social Website For Movies This is social site website for movie buffs where a user can create his/her account, post their blogs, comment on others posts , give a review for the movies as well give a rating for them. The website has three section: Movie Page Section one has all the movies where in there’s movies descritpion, a trailer, movie’s default imdb rating and user’s rating if any.

item.title: Youtube Video Analyzer
item.description: Youtube Video Analyzer; GUI built using Tkinter This is a Data Science cum python project Data Extraction using Web Scraping & Youtube API : This was the challenging part where required data needed to be extracted. I have used selenium as well beautiful to scrap data from youtube. Some datas like comments cannot be scrapped , for that I used Youtube API to extract some number of comments from videos.
